channel.title: Servers down
channel.description: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: :mad: i cant log onto [b][i][u]ANY[/u][/i][/b] servers.... ive tried every on of them... [img]http://C:\Documents and Settings\SpidyMan\My Documents\My Pictures\untitled.bmp[/img] thats what it loks like... EVERY God ~~~~ Time... if you can help, i'd greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Servers down
item.dc:creator: @learner learner
item.description:
@learner wrote:

what if he dail up? then this -->it should be a box with a cable leading to your computer and another cable just like that one (could be a different color) leading to your modem and might have antena(s) and on the front have some blinking lights <-- is no good.( no offence man just saying i got dail up with my bro’s computer and I"m telling u takes 1 hour to download a song.

image wont shw up so, it says:
[center]error connecting to server. must be down. click cancel then start server to make your own.[/center][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 01:48:38 PM[/size][hr]i have hamachi[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 01:49:34 PM[/size][hr]shorty how do i set up the router?

item.title: Servers down
item.dc:creator: @shorty_5855 shorty_5855
item.description:
@shorty_5855 wrote:

you need to have hamachi and join someones network…then use their server ip and port to get hamachi go to www.hamachi.cc and to change the port click on the moparscape client file> new port> ENTER THE PORT HERE> ok you can try my server just go here for my serve thread http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,111640.0.html o an you may need to port forward just go here http://www.portforward.com/routers.htm hope that helps

Read full topic
